column4: Traffic;Siem Reap:------ UPDATE: Two Chinese nationals (now ------reported------ as one male and one female) were killed
column5: eleven more injured. UPDATE: ------Kohsantepheap------ are now reporting a Chinese female also died.------The Cambodian driver and guide fled the scene.------At 12:40 pm on 21 July 2019
column6: there was an accident on the road leading down from------ Kulen mountain.------Thirteen people were inside the vehicle when it crashed. Five people (two women) were taken to hospital. All are reported to be Chinese.------To see photos of injured Chinese tourists
